verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> clothed with <S%G4016><s%> a cloud: <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> was upon <S%G1909><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> was as it were <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sun, <S%G2246><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%> of fire: <S%G4442><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a little book <S%G974><s%> open: <S%G455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he set <S%G5087><s%> his <S%G848><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his left <S%G2176><s%> foot on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> when a lion <S%G3023><s%> roareth: <S%G3455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had cried, <S%G2896><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> voices. <S%G5456><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> had uttered <S%G2980><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> voices, <S%G5456><s%> I was about <S%G3195><s%> to write: <S%G1125><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> Seal up <S%G4972><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered, <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> them <S%G5023><s%> not. <S%G3361><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> lifted up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G848><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him that liveth <S%G2198><s%> forever and ever, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> which are therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there should be <S%G2071><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> longer: <S%G2089><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he shall begin <S%G3195><s%> to sound, <S%G4537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should be finished, <S%G5055><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he hath declared <S%G2097><s%> to his <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> and take <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> little book <S%G974><s%> which is open <S%G455><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> which standeth <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> little book. <S%G974><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> eat it up; <S%G2719><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it shall make thy belly bitter, <S%G4087><s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G2836><s%> but <S%G235><s%> it shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> honey. <S%G3192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> little book <S%G974><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel's <S%G32><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ate it up; <S%G2719><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> honey: <S%G3192><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as soon as <S%G3753><s%> I had eaten <S%G5315><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> was bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> Thou <S%G4571><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> peoples, <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kings. <S%G935><s%>
